name: Three Nights at jumpscare 2020
description:
Three Nights at jumpscare you play as animatronic getting chased by the red fox animatronic because you are the fugitive.

Survive your way and escape from masked animatronic.
At later level you will find that your firearm and weapon is very useful to escape.

Three Nights at jumpscare is an open world game play your role as fugitive animatronic. Find your way to police station and collect all fire arm to weaponized you to fight all the animatronic.

At first mission you must collect all keys unnoticed and use your stealth ability.

GAME FEATURES:

- Each mission has its own cutscene and exciting storyline
- You can see the enemy searching for you by view the HUD on the left corner
- On the later level you can ride all vehicle scattered in the city
